popover.primary: A mastery path focused on dealing damage to a single, far-away enemy.
popover.secondary: Bow counts 100% of its dps to abilities, sword counts 45%.

popover.primary: A mastery path focused on fighting in melee combat.
popover.secondary: Sword counts 100% of its dps towards abilities.

popover.primary: A mastery path focused on fighting multiple enemies at medium range.
popover.secondary: Bow counts 100% of its dps to abilities, sword counts 45%.

data.name: Acid Arrow
data.description: An attack which deals X physical damage and causes your target to take a (15 * rank) ability penalty to armor and reduces their chance to block by 10% for 10 seconds.

data.name: Assault Stance
data.note: Can only have one active stance.
data.description:
A close-combat stance which causes you to gain a 49 unique bonus to strength, +45% auto attack damage, +10% parry, and a ?? unique bonus to armor.

While in Assault Stance; your ballistic skill from items will also count towards your strength, and your ranged critical chance from items will also count towards your melee critical chance.

data.name: Barrage
data.description: Deals X physical damage to all enemies in an arc in front of you, up to 40 feet away.

data.name: Bend the Winds
data.description: Gain a 252 unique bonus to elemental resistance.

data.name: Blood-Soaked War
data.description: Any time you kill an enemy, you will instantly regain 321 health.

data.name: Broadhead Arrow
data.description: An ailment which deals X physical damage to your target over 15 seconds.

data.name: Brutal Assault
data.note:
Target must be facing away from you
Requires Scout or Assault Stance
data.description:
Deals X physical damage to your target, and makes monsters hate you less than normal. Only usable when you are behind the target.
If you are Vengeful, then this attack may be used from any position.

data.name: Bullseye
data.description: Whenever you critically hit an enemy, your chance to critically hit is increased by 20% for 5 seconds, but you also become 10% more vulnerable to being critically hit.

data.name: Centuries of Training
data.description: Upon striking a target with a direct damage ability there is a 25% chance to inflict an additional 252 spirit damage over 3 seconds.

data.name: Clever Recovery
data.description:
If an enemy dodges any of your attacks, you will regain 40 action points.
This effect will not trigger more than once every 3 seconds.

data.name: Concealment
data.description: With luck and experience you are able to dodge all ranged attacks and disrupt all magic attacks against you for 7 seconds.

data.name: Counterstrike
data.description: A quick strike which deals X damage to your target. Attempts to interrupts any ability that they were building up and will deal an additional Y physical damage if successful.

data.name: Discerning Offense
data.description: Your attacks have a 10% reduced chance to be defended against.

data.name: Distracting Rebounds
data.description: Distracting Shot will now also affect any other enemies within 20 feet of your initial target.

data.name: Distracting Shot
data.description: You detaunt your target, making them hate you less and causing them to deal only 50% damage to you for 15 seconds. If you attack anyone that you have detaunted, the effect will immediately end.

data.name: Draw Blood
data.description: An ailment which deals X physical damage over 9 seconds.

data.name: Eagle Eye
data.description: A well aimed arrow that deals X physical damage.

data.name: Enchanted Arrows
data.description: All attacks in the Path of the Scout will now inflict corporeal damage, and Acid Arrow will now cause your target to take a (7.5 * rank) ability penalty to corporeal resistance

data.name: Expert Skirmisher
data.description: Your cast times are reduced to 50% when you are within 35 feet of your target, but you will be snared by X% for Ys whenever you cast an ability.

data.name: Exploit Opportunity
data.description: You launch yourself a medium distance forward dealing X physical damage to enemies within 30 feet of the landing area.

data.name: Explosive Shots
data.description:
All of your ranged attacks will explode for the next 10 seconds, dealing 300 damage to all enemies within 20 feet of your target.
This effect will not trigger more than once every second.

data.name: Eye Shot
data.note:
Requires Skirmish Stance
Target must be Ailing.
data.description: A crippling shot that deals X physical damage and causes your target to take a (3 * rank) ability penalty to initiative for 20 seconds. This ability will continue to build up even if you move. 3 Second knockdown.

data.name: Fell The Weak
data.description: Deals X physical damage if your target is below 30% hit points, or Y physical damage otherwise.

data.name: Festering Arrow
data.description: Deals X corporeal damage to your target and applies an ailment which inflicts an additional X corporeal damage for 3 seconds.

data.name: Flame Arrow
data.description: Your target is caught on fire for 6s taking X corporeal damage every 2s. As the fires consume them, they will take 50% more damage every dot tick

data.name: Flanking Shot
data.note:
Requires Skirmish Stance
Target must be facing away from you
data.description: Deals X physical damage to your target. Only usable from behind the target. The critical chance of the ability is increased by the percentage of life left on the enemy target.

data.name: Flee
data.description:
You run away from the battle in a mad panic, increasing your run speed by 30% for 10 seconds. You immediately lose all of your action points, any career mechanic points, and your morale will begin to drop, and you will not begin to regain action points until 10 seconds have passed.

You can use this ability again to cancel the effect early, but you will still remain panicked and will not regain action points for the full duration.

data.name: Focused Mind
data.description: For the next 10 seconds, you will remove and ignore any silencing, disarming, rooting, snaring effects and your abilities will build 50% faster and may not be set back.

data.name: Glass Arrow
data.description: Target a 20ft radius area. For the next 6 seconds, enemies within the area will have their range and aoe radius reduced by 25% and take X physical damage a second.

data.name: Grim Slash
data.description: Deals X physical damage to your target.

data.name: Hail of Doom
data.description: You focus on a spot on the ground, shooting arrows at that spot every 0.5 seconds for 5 seconds, hitting all enemies within 20 feet of that area for 300 damage as long as you maintain your concentration.

data.name: Hunter's Fervor
data.description: An inspired ferver fills your group, increasing AP regeneration by 20% for 15 seconds to all groupmates within 100 feet of you.

data.name: Instill Fear
data.description: You deal 1200 damage to all enemies within 30 feet and staggers the target for up to 6 seconds, preventing all actions unless they are damaged.

data.name: Instinctive Aim
data.description: Gives a 120 unique bonus to strength, ballistic skill, and weaponskill, and a 120 unique penalty to toughness.

data.name: Keen Arrowheads
data.description:
Path of Skirmisher abilities deal X% more damage to targets within 55 to 80 feet.

This idea was a placeholder for an idea that eventually was scrapped. A new idea was not put in its place before the due date.

data.name: Leading Shots
data.description: Any time you critically hit with a ranged attack, the chance to critically hit will be increased by 8% for 10 seconds for group members within 100 feet, but this will not affect you.

data.name: Lileath's Arrow
data.description: A piercing arrow which deals X physical damage to all enemies in front of you, up to 65 feet away. This ability will continue to build up even if you move.

data.name: Lileath's Forgiveness
data.description: Removes all hexes, curses, cripples, and ailments from you. You regain 250 action points.

data.name: Masterful Aim
data.description: Gain a 160 unique bonus to ballistic skill.

data.name: Merciless Soldier
data.description: All of your attacks against a target you are flanking that is afflicted by draw blood will ignore (30 * rank) armor.

data.name: No Quarter
data.description: Eagle's Eye, Acid Arrow, and Festering Arrow now builds up 1 seconds faster.

data.name: No Respite
data.description: Your damage is increased by 15% when under 65 feet away from your target.

data.name: Opportunistic Strike
data.description: A crippling attack that deals X physical damage and disarms your target for 4 seconds, making them unable to use melee or ranged weapons.

data.name: Outrider Patrol
data.description: Arrows strike the ground at a spot you select, dealing 1200 damage to all enemies within 20 feet of that spot.

data.name: Penetrating Arrow
data.description: Deals 1200 damage to all enemies in front of you, up to 40 feet away, and an additional 1200 damage over 10 seconds.

data.name: Pierce Defenses
data.description: If an enemy dodges or parries any of your attacks, their chances to dodge and parry will be reduced by 10% for 8 seconds.

data.name: Point-Blank
data.description: A mid-range attack that deals 600 damage and knocks targeted player away. Monsters will be knocked down.

data.name: Powerful Draw
data.description: Increases the maximum range of Spiral-Fletched Arrow, Flanking Shot, and Eye Shot by 50%.

data.name: Rain of Steel
data.description: You repeatedly shoot arrows at the ground for 10 seconds, dealing 219 damage every second to all enemies within 20 feet of that spot.

data.name: Rapid Fire
data.description:
You move with blinding speed as you quickly fire several shots at your target, dealing X physical damage to the enemy twice per second for up to 3 seconds. This effect will end if you break your concentration, or run out of action points.
If you are Vengeful, then the shots will deal 10% more damage.

data.name: Replenishing Strikes
data.description: Any time you critically hit an enemy, you will regain 40 action points. Tactic can not trigger more than once every 3 seconds.

data.name: Scout Stance
data.note: Can only have one stance active.
data.description: A long-distance bow stance that increases the range of your bow attacks by 10%.

data.name: Shadow Sting
data.description: An ailment which deals X damage to your target over 10 seconds and causes all healing effects used on them to become 50% weaker.

data.name: Sinister Assault
data.description: Brutal Assault will now increase the target's chance to be crit by 10% for 10 seconds

data.name: Skirmish Stance
data.note: Can only have one stance active.
data.description: A close-range bow stance that grants the ability to autoattack while moving.

data.name: Guerilla Training
data.description: Flame Arrow and Spiral-Fletched Arrow now hit enemies within 20ft of primary target.

data.name: Smoldering Arrows
data.description: Flame Arrow deals additional damage.

data.name: Spiral-Fletched Arrow
data.description: Deals X physical damage to your target. This ability will continue to build up even if you move.

data.name: Steady Aim
data.description: For the next 6 seconds, all of your abilities that do damage will have a 50% higher chance to critically hit, but will take an additional 1.5 seconds to build up.

data.name: Sweeping Slash
data.description: Deals higher physical damage to target. If you attacked the target from the sides or behind, the next direct ranged or magical attack the target takes within 10 seconds will deal 15% more damage.

data.name: Swift Strikes
data.description: Deals X physical damage 3 times. Deals an additional Y damage, adds 30% movement speed over 3s, and reduces active path of assault cooldowns by 5 seconds. Each damage tick that does not land removes one of these effects.

data.name: Takedown
data.description: An ailment which deals X physical damage and snares your target, reducing their run speed by 40% for 10 seconds.

data.name: Throat Shot
data.description: A crippling shot that deals X physical damage and silences your target for 4 seconds, making them unable to use magic.

data.name: Vengeance of Nagarythe
data.description: You are filled with a desire for vengeance, increasing all damage you deal by 25% for 10 seconds.

data.name: Whirling Pin
data.description: All enemies within 30 feet become snared, reducing movement speed by 40% for the next 10 seconds. You are knocked back away from your enemies.

data.name: Whirling Rage
data.description: Deals (267 + 53.33 * assault rank) damage to all enemies within 30 feet.

data.name: Wrist Slash
data.description: Grim Slash now has a 100% chance to cause the target to take a 120 ability penalty to weaponskill and a 80 ability penalty to initiative for 20s. You will gain a 120 unique bonus to weaponskill and a 80 unique bonus to initiative for 20s.
